en:
Join the hundreds of researchers from around
           the world who are part of the Open Specy community by
           analyzing, sharing, processing, and identifying
           their Raman and IR spectra. These services are free and open source thanks to our partners:
su:
Gabung ratusan peneliti ti sabudeureun
           dunya anu bagian tina komunitas Open Specy ku
           nganalisis, babagi, ngolah, jeung ngaidentipikasi
           spéktra Raman jeung IR maranéhanana. Ladenan ieu gratis sareng open source berkat mitra kami:

en:
In Brief: To use the tool upload a csv, asp, jdx, spc, or spa file to the upload file tab.
                                  If csv, one column should be named 'wavenumber' (in units of 1/cm) and another named 'intensity'.
                                  You can smooth your data using an SG filter, baseline correct your data using the polynomial order of iModPolyFit, and restrict the wavelength range for the match.
                                  The result will be compared to an internal Raman or FTIR spectra library. The strongest 1000 matches along with your
                                  uploaded or processed data will be presented in an interactive plot and table. For more details click the button below
                                  or watch the detailed instructional video.
su:
Singketna: Pikeun nganggo alat, unggah file csv, asp, jdx, spc, atanapi spa kana tab file unggah.
                                  Lamun csv, hiji kolom kudu ngaranna 'wavenumber' (dina hijian 1/cm) sarta séjén ngaranna 'inténsitas'.
                                  Anjeun tiasa ngahaluskeun data anjeun nganggo saringan SG, ngabenerkeun data dasar anjeun nganggo urutan polinomial iModPolyFit, sareng ngabatesan rentang panjang gelombang pikeun pertandingan.
                                  Hasilna bakal dibandingkeun sareng perpustakaan spéktra Raman atanapi FTIR internal. The neneng 1000 patandingan sapanjang kalawan anjeun
                                  data nu diunggah atawa diolah bakal dibere dina plot interaktif tur tabel. Pikeun leuwih rinci klik tombol di handap
                                  atawa lalajo video instruksional lengkep.

en:
Reference spectra was sourced from open access resources
           online, peer reviewed publications, and corporate donations. In the future
           spectra that is uploaded to the tool will be incorporated to the reference
           library to make it even better.
su:
spéktra rujukan ieu sourced ti sumber aksés kabuka
           online, publikasi peer reviewed, sarta sumbangan perusahaan. Di masa anu payun
           spéktra anu diunggah kana alat bakal dilebetkeun kana rujukan
           perpustakaan sangkan eta malah hadé.

en:
To share spectra upload a file to the upload file tab. If you selected Share a copy of your spectra will be sent to the Community
           Data Warehouse on Open Science Framework. To add additional metadata, 
           fill in the avaliable metadata fields and click -Share Data-. The 
           spectra file that you uploaded along with your responses will be copied 
           to the a -With Metadata- subfolder at the link below. All shared data holds 
           a Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.
su:
Pikeun ngabagi spéktra unggah file kana tab unggah file. Upami anjeun milih Bagikeun salinan spéktra anjeun bakal dikirim ka Komunitas
           Gudang Data on Open Science Framework. Pikeun nambahkeun metadata tambahan,
           eusian widang metadata sadia tur klik -Bagikeun Data-. The
           file spéktra anu anjeun unggah sareng réspon anjeun bakal disalin
           ka subfolder -With Metadata- dina tautan di handap. Kabéh data dibagikeun nahan
           Lisensi Atribusi Creative Commons 4.0.

en:
All parameters in this tool are tested to validate that 
           the tool is functioning as best as possible and determine the best default 
           parameters to use. Our current validation proceedure includes correcting 
           duplicated entries in the reference libraries, checking for spectra in 
           metadata that isn't in the spectral library, and ensuring the the default 
           parameters provide over 80% accuracy in the first match.
su:
Sadaya parameter dina alat ieu diuji pikeun mastikeun éta
           alat ieu fungsina sabisa-gancang sarta nangtukeun standar pangalusna
           parameter dipaké. Prosedur validasi kami ayeuna kalebet koréksi
           éntri duplikat dina perpustakaan rujukan, mariksa spéktra di
           metadata anu henteu aya dina perpustakaan spéktral, sareng mastikeun yén standar
           parameter nyadiakeun leuwih 80% akurasi dina pertandingan munggaran.

en: Updates, Feature Requests, and Bug Reports
su: Pembaruan, Paménta Fitur, sareng Laporan Bug

en: We keep track of all updates using version control on our code. Features can be requested and bug reported on GitHub.
su: Kami ngalacak sadaya apdet nganggo kontrol versi dina kode kami. Fitur tiasa dipénta sareng bug dilaporkeun dina GitHub.

en: Follow us on Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com to be added to the mailing list.
su: Tuturkeun kami dina Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com pikeun ditambahkeun kana milis.

en: Free FTIR Software: siMPle microplastic IR spectral identification software
su: Parangkat Lunak FTIR Gratis: parangkat lunak idéntifikasi spéktral IR mikroplastik basajan

en: Free Spectroscopy Learning Academy from ThermoFisher
su: Akademi Pembelajaran Spektroskopi Gratis ti ThermoFisher

en: Free Optical Microscopy Learning Resource from Florida State University
su: Sumberdaya Pembelajaran Mikroskop Optik Gratis ti Florida State University

en: Free desktop application for spectral analysis and links to reference databases.
su: Aplikasi desktop gratis pikeun analisa spéktral sareng tautan ka pangkalan data rujukan.

en:
If you like, we share your uploaded spectra and settings with the spectroscopy community.
           By default, all data will be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Uploaded spectra will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
su:
Upami anjeun resep, kami bagikeun spéktra sareng setélan anu anjeun unggah ka komunitas spéktroskopi.
           Sacara standar, sadaya data bakal dilisensikeun ku Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Spéktra anu diunggah bakal muncul di dieu: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en:
Upload Raman or FTIR spectrum files as a csv, jdx, spc, or spa. A csv file is preferred. If a csv, the file must contain one column labeled 'wavenumber' in units of (1/cm) and another column labeled 'intensity' in absorbance units.
            If jdx, spc, spa, or 0 the file should be a single absorbance spectrum with wavenumber in (1/cm). These files will not always work perfectly because they are tricky to read so double check them in another software.
            Hit the 'Test Data' button to download a sample Raman spectrum.
su:
Unggah file spéktrum Raman atanapi FTIR salaku csv, jdx, spc, atanapi spa. A file csv pikaresep. Lamun csv, file kudu ngandung hiji kolom dilabélan 'wavenumber' dina hijian (1/cm) sarta kolom séjén dilabélan 'inténsitas' dina unit absorbance.
            Lamun jdx, spc, spa, atawa 0 file kudu spéktrum absorbance tunggal kalawan wavenumber dina (1/cm). Berkas-berkas ieu moal salawasna jalan sampurna sabab hese dibaca ku kituna pariksa deui dina parangkat lunak anu sanés.
            Pencét tombol 'Test Data' pikeun ngaunduh sampel spéktrum Raman.

en:
If the uploaded spectrum is not in absorbance units, 
           use this input to specify the units to convert from.Open Specy can 
           adjust reflectance or transmittance spectra to Absorbance units using 
           this drop down in the upload file tab. All of the preceding tabs 
           assume that the data is in absorbance units so you should make the 
           correction before continuing if needed. The transmittance adjustment 
           uses the log10(1/T) calculation which does not correct for system 
           and particle characteristics. The reflectance adjustment uses the 
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). We assume that the reflectance 
           is formatted as a percent from 1-100 and first correct the intensity by dividing by 100
           so that it fits the form expected by the equation.
           If none is selected, Open Specy assumes that the uploaded data is 
           an absorbance spectrum.
su:
Upami spéktrum anu diunggah henteu aya dina unit nyerep,
           make input ieu nangtukeun unit pikeun ngarobah from.Open Specy tiasa
           saluyukeun reflectance atanapi transmitansi spéktrum ka Unit Nyerep ngagunakeun
           leupaskeun ieu dina tab unggah file. Sadaya tab sateuacana
           nganggap yén data aya dina unit absorbance jadi Anjeun kudu nyieun
           koreksi saméméh nuluykeun lamun diperlukeun. Penyesuaian transmitansi
           ngagunakeun log10 (1/T) itungan nu teu bener pikeun sistem
           jeung ciri partikel. adjustment reflectance ngagunakeun
           Persamaan Kubelka-Munk (1-R)2/(2*R). Urang nganggap yén reflectance nu
           diformat salaku persen tina 1-100 sareng mimiti ngabenerkeun inténsitas ku ngabagi 100
           sangkan luyu jeung wangun nu dipiharep ku persamaan.
           Upami teu aya anu dipilih, Open Specy nganggap yén data anu diunggah nyaéta
           spéktrum absorbance.

en: This is a sample spectrum that can be uploaded to the tool for testing it out and understanding how the csv files should be formatted.
su: Ieu mangrupikeun spéktrum sampel anu tiasa diunggah kana alat pikeun nguji éta sareng ngartos kumaha file csv kedah diformat.

en:
We share any uploaded spectra and metadata with the spectroscopy community if you fill out the metadata here and select share.
           Uploaded spectra and metadata will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
su:
Kami ngabagi spéktra sareng metadata anu diunggah sareng komunitas spéktroskopi upami anjeun ngeusian metadata di dieu teras pilih bagikeun.
           Spéktra sareng metadata anu diunggah bakal muncul di dieu: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en: Upload some data to get started...
Smooth, Baseline Correct, and Download Processed Spectra
su: Lemes, Baseline Bener, sareng Ngundeur Spéktra Diolah

en: Some users may wish to save a copy of their processed spectrum. This button downloads the processed spectrum as a csv file.
su: Sababaraha pangguna panginten hoyong nyimpen salinan spéktrum anu diolah. Tombol ieu ngaunduh spéktrum anu diolah salaku file csv.

en: This smoother can enhance the signal to noise ratio of the data and uses a Savitzky-Golay filter with 12 running data points and the polynomial specified.
su: Ieu smoother bisa ningkatkeun sinyal pikeun babandingan noise data sarta ngagunakeun filter Savitzky-Golay kalawan 12 titik data ngajalankeun sarta polynomial dieusian.

en: This baseline correction routine has two options for baseline correction, 1) the polynomial imodpolyfit procedure to itteratively find the baseline of the spectrum using a polynomial fit to the entire region of the spectra. 2) manual lines can be drawn using the line tool on the plot and the correct button will use the lines to subtract the baseline.
su: Rutinitas koreksi garis dasar ieu boga dua pilihan pikeun koreksi garis dasar, 1) prosedur imodpolyfit polinomial pikeun manggihan garis dasar spéktrum sacara itteratif ngagunakeun fit polinomial ka sakabéh wewengkon spéktra. 2) garis manual tiasa digambar nganggo alat garis dina plot sareng tombol anu leres bakal nganggo garis pikeun ngirangan garis dasar.

en: Restricting the spectral range can remove regions of spectrum where no peaks exist and improve matching
su: Ngawates rentang spéktral tiasa ngaleungitkeun daérah spéktrum anu henteu aya puncak sareng ningkatkeun patandingan

en: Identify Spectrum Using the Reference Library
This selection will determine whether the FTIR or Raman matching library is used. Choose the spectrum type that was uploaded.
su: Pilihan ieu bakal nangtukeun naha perpustakaan cocog FTIR atanapi Raman dipaké. Pilih jinis spéktrum anu diunggah.

en: This selection will determine whether the uploaded (not processed) spectrum or the spectrum processed using the processing tab is used in the spectrum match.
su: Pilihan ieu bakal nangtukeun naha spéktrum anu diunggah (henteu diolah) atanapi spéktrum anu diolah nganggo tab pamrosésan dianggo dina pertandingan spéktrum.

en: This selection will determine whether the library you are matching to consists of the full spectrum or only spectrum peaks.
su: Pilihan ieu bakal nangtukeun naha perpustakaan anjeun cocog diwangun ku spéktrum pinuh atawa ngan puncak spéktrum.

en: Help us reach our goal of revolutionizing spectroscopy.
su: Mantuan kami ngahontal tujuan urang revolutionizing spéktroskopi.

en: A paid team that is pushing Open Specy closer to the ultimate goal of 100% accurate spectral identification and deep spectral diagnostics with a single click
su: Tim anu mayar anu ngadorong Open Specy langkung caket kana tujuan akhir 100% idéntifikasi spéktral akurat sareng diagnostik spéktral jero kalayan hiji klik

en: A single paid staff person working to update and build the community and the tool
su: Hiji jalma anu mayar tunggal damel pikeun ngapdet sareng ngawangun komunitas sareng alat éta

en: Maintenance costs and minor ad-hoc updates and bug fixes
su: Biaya pangropéa sareng apdet ad-hoc minor sareng perbaikan bug

en: Keeping the app online and essential maintenance
su: Ngajaga aplikasi online sareng pangropéa penting

en: Thank you for sharing your data!
su: Hatur nuhun pikeun babagi data anjeun!

en: Your data will soon be available at https://osf.io/stmv4/
su: Data anjeun bakal sayogi di https://osf.io/stmv4/

en:
Uploaded data type is not currently supported; please
                      check tooltips and 'About' tab for details.
su:
Jenis data anu diunggah ayeuna henteu dirojong; Punten
                      pariksa tooltips sarta tab 'Ngeunaan' pikeun detil.

en:
If you uploaded a text/csv file, make sure that the 
           columns are numeric and named 'wavenumber' and 
           'intensity'.
su:
Upami anjeun unggah file téks/csv, pastikeun yén file
           kolom anu numerik sarta ngaranna 'wavenumber' na
           'hal sabaraha kuatna'.
